description: Main entry point for a Flutter app, defining the app structure and UI components including MaterialApp, Scaffold, AppBar, and Center with progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: StatefulWidget representing the home page with a dynamic title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, displaying app title and loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point that initializes the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, defining UI layout.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
